structure.unit: ARTICLE IB. STANDARDS FOR CREATION AND REVIEW OF BOARDS GENERALLY

law.catch_line: Application of the Miami-Dade County Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance.

text.section:
Sec. 2-11.39.2. Application of the Miami-Dade County Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance.
The provisions of the Miami-Dade County Conflict of Interest and Code of Ethics Ordinance shall be applicable to county boards.
